title: Simply Genius Cookies with Tara O'Brady
description:
Referenced in this episode 

  • Simply Genius Cookbook
  • Tara O'Brady's Genius Chocolate Chip Cookies
  • Tara O'Brady on Substack

Genius-Hunter Extra Credit

  • Tara O'Brady's Website
  • Tara O'Brady's Instagram

Have a genius recipe you'd like to share? Tell me all about it at genius@food52.com.

Theme Music by The Cabinetmaker on Blue Dot Sessions
author: podcasts@food52.com (Kristen Miglore, Tara O'Brady)

itunes:title: Simply Genius Cookies with Tara O'Brady
itunes:author: Kristen Miglore, Tara O'Brady
itunes:summary: The Simply Genius Cookbook is out now!! To celebrate, we're talking all about one of the featured recipes from the book, Tara O'Brady's Basic, Great, Chocolate Chip Cookies.
